mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, dlvy_addr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date) VALUES(seq_transaction_tran_no.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{divyAddr}, #{divyRequest}, #{tranCode}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT pro.prod_name, tran.tran_no, tran.buyer_id, tran.prod_no, tran.receiver_name, tran.tran_status_code FROM product pro, transaction tran WHERE pro.prod_no = tran.prod_no AND tran.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT pro.prod_name, tran.tran_no, tran.buyer_id, tran.prod_no, tran.receiver_name, tran.tran_status_code FROM product pro, transaction tran WHERE pro.prod_no = tran.prod_no AND tran.buyer_id = #{value} ORDER BY prod_no ) countTalble
